testcase.name: Test Case 6 User should be able to edit event. When user click
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enter valid username and valid password...........................passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed And user fills "Welcome 2023" "New Year Celebration" and Event Date fields..passed Then user fills participants informations for 5 participants and click the Create New Event button.passed And user clicks edit event button and checks "Welcome 2023" and "New Year Celebration" whether according to editing event.passed
